product_name: Royal Robbins Austin Pass Shirt - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With a fabric blend to keep you cool and a ventilated back, the Royal Robbins Austin Pass shirt is great for travel or days when your lunch hour turns into a game of frisbee golf in the park. Soft cotton is blended with Coolmax(R) polyester for great comfort in warm weather; fabric resists wrinkles, dries quickly and breathes well. 2 chest pockets with button-flap closures and a zippered chest pocket keep items within reach. Sleeves roll up and secure with button-closure tabs. Mesh-lined yoke; back ventilation. The Royal Robbins Austin Pass shirt has a traditional fit. Closeout.
short_description: With a fabric blend to keep you cool and a ventilated back, the Royal Robbins Austin Pass shirt is great for travel or days when your lunch hour turns into a game of frisbee golf in the park.
